casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ronnie Paul GODBEY 443PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 24, 2017. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Godbey, Ronnie Paul. Anita LeVeaux, Special Deputy Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Southport.

Amy Bircher, Assistant Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of March 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of March 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 26th day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
